org.treetank.io
Interface IWriter

All Superinterfaces:
IReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
BerkeleyWriter, FileWriter
public interface IWriter
extends IReader

Interface to provide the abstract layer related to write access of the tt-backend.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
